function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in intervention time leading to deviation from actual epidemic curve","Impact":"Increase in peak value, extension of peak arrival time, and longer epidemic duration","Mitigation":"Implement timely quarantine measures","Technologies":"Epidemic modeling and prediction tools","People":"Populations in affected areas","Owner":"Health authorities, government agencies"},{"Description":"Influence of self-protection measures on the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Mitigation of spread of COVID-19","Mitigation":"Implementation of effective self-protection measures and quarantines","Technologies":"Public health campaigns, educational resources","People":"General population","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
